h1_title: How to Open the Purple Seal Prison Doors in the Pagoda Realm
h2_title: How to Remove the Purple Magic Seals on the Prison Cells in Chapter 3
content: When you first wake up in the jail cell in the Pagoda Realm of the New West region, there will be nowhere to go but outside to the long ledge that wraps around the huge room. Head left from the cell, and you’ll find another one next door to yours. This one has a **purple circle magic seal** on the outside, preventing you from getting into it. You will, however, find an NPC inside that you can speak to.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Open_the_Purple_Seal_Prison_Doors_in_the_Pagoda_Realm.md', within the main section titled 'How to Open the Purple Seal Prison Doors in the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'How to Remove the Purple Magic Seals on the Prison Cells in Chapter 3'.
The content is as follows:
When you first wake up in the jail cell in the Pagoda Realm of the New West region, there will be nowhere to go but outside to the long ledge that wraps around the huge room. Head left from the cell, and you’ll find another one next door to yours. This one has a **purple circle magic seal** on the outside, preventing you from getting into it. You will, however, find an NPC inside that you can speak to.
